entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19 with temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind south 20 km/h. Low minus 19 with temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
